parameter.name: pairingEnabled
parameter.label: Enable Device Pairing
parameter.description: Pairing must be enabled to connect a new device. Once a device has been added, pairing should be disabled.

parameter.name: discoveryIp
parameter.label: Optional discovery address
parameter.description: If your host has multiple IP addresses you may specify the IP you would like to advertise in the UPNP discovery process. You may safely leave this empty on most systems.
